title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: The US government is in favor of the killing in Ukraine to continue, especially since it was China's Xi and Russia's Putin who were pushing for peace.Ukraine Soldiers Kidnap New “Recruits.” Meanwhile, Biden Spokesman Says Peace Is “Unacceptable”https://needtoknow.news/2023/03/ukraine-soldiers-kidnap-new-recruits-meanwhile-biden-spokesman-says-peace-is-unacceptable/Shocking video shows soldiers in Ukraine kidnap and forcibly conscript men in broad daylight to fight in the the losing war against Russia. Over 100,000 Ukrainians are dead, but US warmongers in power continue to push war. Prior to President Xi Jinping’s meeting with President Putin in Russia to discuss a Ukraine peace plan, White house spokesman John Kirby declared that any call for a ceasefire is “unacceptable.” US Secretary of State Anthony Blinken said that the cessation of hostilities would violate the UN charter. Need To Know News does not endorse Chinese President Xi Jinping and Putin as altruistic peacemakers and statesmen, but does support peace in the US/ NATO proxy war against Russia....Ukrainian Soldiers Are Being Sent to Their Deaths while the Media Pretends Ukraine Is Winninghttps://needtoknow.news/2023/03/ukrainian-soldiers-are-being-sent-to-their-deaths-while-the-media-pretends-ukraine-is-winning/An estimated 120,000 Ukrainian soldiers have been killed or wounded since the start of Russia’s invasion last year. Ukraine has a shortage of experienced combat soldiers.The Kyiv Independent published first-hand accounts from Ukrainian soldiers explaining the situation in Bakhmut, a city in Russian-speaking Donbass that has been described as a “meat grinder” as Ukrainian troops on the front lines only survive for an average of four hours....“When they drive us to Bakhmut, I already know I’m being sent to death,” Volodymyr told the Kyiv Independent during his brief stay in Kramatorsk, a city in Donetsk Oblast some 25 kilometers west of the front line....
